result.explanation: Invalid or missing ‘mdui:Description’ and/or ‘mdui:DisplayName’ under ‘md:SPSSODescriptor/md:Extensions/mdui:UIInfo’ in language with code ‘en’, or display name (= ‘Service Provider for the CLARIN Research Infrastructure provided by ILC-CNR’) length (= 75) < 5 or > 33, or description (= ‘ILC-CNR for the CLARIN-IT consortium: service provider for federated authentication’) length (= 83) < 20 or > 100.
result.requirement: Partially a requirement for DFN-AAI registration. Partially a requirement for the GÉANT Data Protection Code of Conduct Entity Category. Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation.
Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation. See: http://docs.oasis-open.org/security/saml/Post2.0/sstc-request-initiation.html .
Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation. See: http://docs.oasis-open.org/security/saml/Post2.0/sstc-saml-idp-discovery.html .
